metadata.name: Sand Stories
metadata.description: The life in sand is different as an outer planet. we only see the beauty of the sand dunes and wind but the real view is the hardship of the people surviving their. the hardship faced even for getting a drop of water to drink and sustain their lives. sand feeds punishes them but still protect them and feeds them. Sand story is nothing but a way of life still unbelievable for the outer world.
